import React from 'react'; import { FaCodepen, FaStore, FaUserFriends, FaUsers } from 'react-icons/fa' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Spinner from '../components/layout/spinner' import { useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import GithubContext from '../context/github/GithubContext'; import ReposList from '../components/repos/ReposList'; import { getUserAndRepos } from '../context/github/GithubAction'; function User() { const { user, loading ,repos,dispatch} = useContext(GithubContext) const params = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch({type:'SET_LOADING'}) // to fetch the getuser data from the action we will use the async await const getUserData = async() => { const userData = await getUserAndRepos(params.login) dispatch({type:'GET_USER_AND_REPOS' , payload:userData}) } getUserData() }, [dispatch , params.login]) // destructuring the following from the user const { name, type, avatar_url, location, bio, blog, twitter_username, login, html_url, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable, } = user if (loading) { return } return ( <> {/* wrap div */}
Back To search
{/* making the grid */}

{name}

{login}

{/* column grid */}

{name}
{type}
{/* hireable= is actually a boolean */} {hireable && (
Hireable
)}

{bio}

Visit Github Profile
{/* user location */} {location && (
Loaction
{location}
)} {blog && (
Website
{blog}
)} {twitter_username && (
Twitter
{twitter_username}
)}
Followers
{followers}
Following
{following}
Public Repos
{public_repos}
Public Gists
{public_gists}
) } export default User
